Scheduled maintenance: Thursday, March 23, 2023, at 11 AM CET (10 AM UTC)
Due to scheduled upgrades, all Bitstamp services will be temporarily unavailable.

Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades and maintenance, all our services across our web platform and app, including logins and signups, will be temporarily unavailable on Thursday, March 23, 2023, starting at 10:00 AM UTC (11:00 AM CET). The maintenance will last approximately 1 hour.

After this period, most support services should be back online, but some features may take slightly longer to get back to full speed due to the nature of the upgrade. We will make sure to keep you updated on our Twitter channel.

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding and patience during this time.
